definition: to wear/to put on/to dress/to bore through/to pierce/to perforate/to penetrate/to pass through/to thread
aspect particle indicating action in progress
to make known/to show/to prove/to write/book/outstanding
to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in

sentences.english: There was a rich man who was clothed in purple and fine linen and who feasted sumptuously every day.
sentences.chinese: 有一個財主穿著紫色袍和細麻布衣服，天天奢華宴樂。

sentences.english: I remember he wore sneakers and no tie.
sentences.chinese: 我記得他穿著運動鞋，沒有系領帶。

sentences.english: Grace tried on dresses over her shorts and tank top .
sentences.chinese: 格雷斯試穿婚紗時僅穿著短褲和背心。

sentences.english: He was wearing dark clothes yet I couldn't tell if it was a jacket or shirt.
sentences.chinese: 他穿著深色衣服，但我不確定究竟是襯衫還是夾克。

sentences.english: Many young lasses were there in their finest dresses.
sentences.chinese: 許多穿著最漂亮衣服的少女都在那裏。

sentences.english: It is illegal for men to be seen publicly in any kind of strapless gown.
sentences.chinese: 男性被公然見到穿著任何無肩帶禮服是違法的。

sentences.english: You must be very hot in that thick sweater.
sentences.chinese: 你穿著那件厚毛衣一定很熱吧。

sentences.english: The judge was wearing a black cope.
sentences.chinese: 這位法官穿著一件黑色的法衣。

sentences.english: We saw several of the van drivers in their blue and yellow livery .
sentences.chinese: 我們看見數個穿著藍黃制服的貨車司機。

sentences.english: He was in a green army air corps uniform.Handsome.Angry.
sentences.chinese: 他穿著綠色的空軍制服，帥氣但憤怒。

sentences.english: Gus in his red jacket and patent-leather boots, whip in hand, stepped to the door of the cage.
sentences.chinese: 葛斯穿著紅夾克，漆皮靴，手握長鞭，走到獸籠門前。

sentences.english: That uniform makes them look absurd.
sentences.chinese: 他們穿著那種制服看起來怪模怪樣的。

sentences.english: The unique cork foot bed of the Good Year Welt construction will mold to your foot as you wear them.
sentences.chinese: 獨特的軟木腳牀的好年頭沿條建設將模具穿著你的腳。

sentences.english: Why do we wear sweaters in cold weather?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼我們會於冷天時穿著毛線衫？

sentences.english: In the early period, the Warders would have performed their duties in plain clothes.
sentences.chinese: 早期時間，守衛盡職時只有穿著普通服飾。

sentences.english: In my best suit, swaggering on the promise of life.
sentences.chinese: 穿著我最好的西裝，對生命中的承諾邁步前進。

definition: long gown/cheongsam/traditional Asian dress for men or (in Hong Kong) women's qipao
